class probpy.density.radial_basis.URBK(variance: float = 0.5, bases: int = 5, cl_iterations: int = 10, use_cl: bool = False, learning_rate: float = 1.0, verbose: bool = False, **_)[source]¶

  • bases – number of rbf bases
